name: War Money
description: This NFT holds a letter addressed to me as a notification of removal of my work Upgraded & Improved from Lazycurator, a show curated by Marek Wolfryd at the Claustro de Sor Juana. In 2012 I founded nimda.co, and 3 years later I discoveredÂ nimda.co.il, a company that sells heavy weapons in the middle east. I used their corporate image to create several works, which were removed after I was accused of using war money. Through this letter, the different versions of nimda became one.
